frame.name: Living_conditions
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Experiencer</fen> must cope with some <fen>Condition</fen> for a prolonged period, usually against his or her will.
<ex><fex name="Experiencer">Americans</fex> <t>live</t> <fex name="Condition">in fear</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Experiencer
FE.definition: <def-root>A person who experiences the effects of some situation or <fen>Condition</fen> for a long period of time.</def-root>

FE.name: Condition
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the situation that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> must cope with over a long period of time.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>Where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is located when he or she faces the <fen>Condition</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>A general description of the temporal location of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> while coping with the <fen>Condition</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> must cope with the <fen>Condition</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: live.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to live under certain conditions for an extended period of time
